languages.text: "Схватка, достойная арены Комморры. Порой мы брали целую семью и заставляли их убивать друг друга — приятно вновь увидеть отцеубийство в исполнении мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "Схватка, достойная арены Комморры. Порой мы брали целую семью и заставляли их убивать друг друга — приятно вновь увидеть отцеубийство в исполнении мон-кай".

languages.text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."
languages.original_text: "Схватка, достойная арены Комморры. Порой мы брали целую семью и заставляли их убивать друг друга — приятно вновь увидеть отцеубийство в исполнении мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch mon-keigh patricide again."
"A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch mon-keigh patricide again."
"A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."

"A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."
"A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."

languages.text: «Una pelea digna de las arenas de Commorragh. Recuerdo espectáculos en los que miembros de una misma familia tenían que matarse entre sí. Qué placer, volver a ver parricidios mon-keigh como aquellos».
languages.original_text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."

traits.locale_text: «Una pelea digna de las arenas de Commorragh. Recuerdo espectáculos en los que miembros de una misma familia tenían que matarse entre sí. Qué placer, volver a ver parricidios mon-keigh como aquellos».

languages.text: 「コモラフの闘技場にふさわしい戦いだ。同じ一族の者同士が殺し合いをさせられた光景を思い出す。再びモン＝ケイの親殺しを目撃できるとは、なんと嬉しいことか」
languages.original_text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."

traits.locale_text: 「コモラフの闘技場にふさわしい戦いだ。同じ一族の者同士が殺し合いをさせられた光景を思い出す。再びモン＝ケイの親殺しを目撃できるとは、なんと嬉しいことか」

languages.text: “这场战斗真该在科摩罗的角斗场上演，我还记得以前观赏那些人骨肉相残的情形。如今，我再次欣赏到了猴子弑父的好戏，这是何等的享受。”
languages.original_text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."

traits.locale_text: “这场战斗真该在科摩罗的角斗场上演，我还记得以前观赏那些人骨肉相残的情形。如今，我再次欣赏到了猴子弑父的好戏，这是何等的享受。”

languages.text: "Ein würdiger Kampf für die Arenen von Commorragh. Ich erinnere mich an Spektakel, bei denen sich Mitglieder ein und derselben Familie gegenseitig töten mussten. Was für eine Freude, endlich wieder einen Vatermord unter Chem-Pan-Sey zu sehen."
languages.original_text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."

traits.locale_text: "Ein würdiger Kampf für die Arenen von Commorragh. Ich erinnere mich an Spektakel, bei denen sich Mitglieder ein und derselben Familie gegenseitig töten mussten. Was für eine Freude, endlich wieder einen Vatermord unter Chem-Pan-Sey zu sehen."

languages.text: « Un combat digne des arènes de Commorragh. Ça me rappelle ces spectacles où les membres d'une même famille étaient contraints de s'entretuer. C'est un plaisir que d'être à nouveau le témoin privilégié d'un parricide entre mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."

traits.locale_text: « Un combat digne des arènes de Commorragh. Ça me rappelle ces spectacles où les membres d'une même famille étaient contraints de s'entretuer. C'est un plaisir que d'être à nouveau le témoin privilégié d'un parricide entre mon-keigh. »

languages.text: "Commorragh arenalarına layık bir dövüş. Aynı aile fertlerinin birbirlerini öldürmek zorunda kaldığı gösteriler hatırlıyorum. Bir kez daha babalarını öldüren mon-keighleri izlemek pek leziz olacak."
languages.original_text: "A fight worthy of Commorragh's arenas. I recall spectacles where members of the same family were forced to kill one another. What a treat it is to watch some mon-keigh patricide again."
